org.eclipse.scada.ui.databinding.item

Interface InvalidValuePolicy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DataItemObservableValue.ReplaceInvalidValuePolicy

    public interface InvalidValuePolicy
    Policy that defined what happens with invalid values
    Since:
    1.0.0

    • Method Summary

      Checks if a value is considered invalid

        boolean isInvalid(DataItemValue value)
        Checks if a value is considered invalid

        Returns:
